description:
Delicious coffee and sustainability in one. This filter is made of 316-grade stainless-steel that is more durable than standard stainless-steel. It replaces paper filters so you can stop paper waste and just wash and go.

  • Made of durable 316 grade stainless-steel for longer lasting use
  • Easy to clean with just a rinse or in the dishwasher
  • Compatible with Aeropress original, Clear and Go. Not compatible with Aeropress XL
name: Aeropress Aeropress Stainless Steel Reusable Filter
